headers.subject: [tools-cvs] CVS update [cws_ooo300_native185]: /tools/solenv/bin/modules/installer/parameter.pm

body.para: Tag: cws_ooo300_native185 User: is Date: 2008-08-13 10:13:09+0000 Modified: tools/solenv/bin/modules/installer/parameter.pm

------------------- --- parameter.pm 2008-07-08 14:10:31+0000 1.55 +++ parameter.pm 2008-08-13 10:13:06+0000 1.55.54.1 @@ -8,7 +8,7 @@ # # $RCSfile: parameter.pm,v $ # -# $Revision: 1.55 $ +# $Revision: 1.55.54.1 $ # # This file is part of OpenOffice.org. # @@ -424,6 +424,12 @@ installer::systemactions::create_directory_with_privileges($installer::globals::temppath,
"777"); my $dirsave = $installer::globals::temppath;
